TopicTitle: Is there any way to copy parts from one ship to another or to change cockpits?

Articles.Content:
I built a neat spaceplane which I later realized would be a great mid-air launch platform for a rocket. Unfortunately, the cockpit is the large shuttle cockpit, so I can\'t easily rebuild it to have an underslung rocket.

Is there any way to copy the plane\'s part configuration into a plane with a different cockpit?

Nope, not in-game at least.

It\'s possible but tricky to edit the craft file to change the pod/cockpit.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
